label: Structure Prediction
description: Predict protein 3D structures from amino acid sequences using AI-based models

defaultInputs.name: Protein List
defaultInputs.description: List of proteins with FASTA sequences
defaultInputs.tooltip: Input table of proteins with names and FASTA sequences for structure prediction.

defaultOutputs.name: Protein name
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Name or identifier of the protein (e.g., 'OR1A1', 'OR2J3').

defaultOutputs.name: Fasta
defaultOutputs.tooltip: FASTA sequence of the protein including header and amino acid sequence.

defaultOutputs.name: pLDDT
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Predicted Local Distance Difference Test score (0-100), indicating confidence in the local structure.

defaultOutputs.name: Druggability
defaultOutputs.tooltip: Druggability score of the detected pocket (0-1). Higher values indicate better druggability.

defaultOutputs.name: 3D Structure
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL to the 3D protein structure PDB file.

configSchema.label: Protein List (Paste)
configSchema.tooltip: Paste protein names and FASTA sequences. Format: >ProteinName followed by sequence on next lines.

configSchema.label: Upload Protein File
configSchema.tooltip: Upload a FASTA file or CSV containing protein names and sequences.

configSchema.label: Prediction Method
configSchema.tooltip: Select the protein structure prediction method. AlphaFold is recommended for highest accuracy.

configSchema.label: Include Confidence Scores
configSchema.tooltip: Include pTM and other confidence metrics in the output.

configSchema.label: Finding the pocket region?
configSchema.tooltip: Whether to detect and analyze binding pocket regions in the predicted structure.

configSchema.label: Choose model to predict pocket
configSchema.tooltip: Select the pocket prediction model. fpocket is fast and open-source, SiteMap provides detailed druggability analysis.
